title: Shuttle And Bobbins, 19th century
creditline: Gift of Mrs. DeWitt Clinton Cohen
description: A dark finely grained wooden shuttle with ends tipped with metal. Metal rod for holding bobbin. With a wooden bobbin wound with black silk thread.

tombstone.epitaph:
Shuttle And Bobbins, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: wood with metal fixtures. Gift of Mrs. DeWitt Clinton Cohen. 1923-7-2-a,b.
